query: UPDATE island_guides SET description = 'A vibrant capital city island offering modern amenities, shopping, dining, and cultural experiences. Perfect for travelers seeking urban exploration before island adventures.', published = 1 WHERE name = 'Male - The Capital City'; UPDATE island_guides SET description = 'A popular local island known for pristine beaches, affordable guesthouses, and authentic Maldivian culture. Ideal for budget-conscious travelers seeking genuine island experiences.', published = 1 WHERE name = 'Maafushi Island'; UPDATE island_guides SET description = 'A charming local island famous for its surf breaks and laid-back atmosphere. Perfect for surfers and those seeking a relaxed island vibe with local hospitality.', published = 1 WHERE name = 'Thulusdhoo Island';
